alert.note: Alert for Knox; Lewis; Marion; Shelby (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 6:22PM CDT until August 29 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Knox County in northeastern Missouri... Northern Shelby County in northeastern Missouri... Northwestern Marion County in northeastern Missouri... Southwestern Lewis County in northeastern Missouri... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 621 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Brashear to near Steffenville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Steffenville around 625 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Plevna. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
